title: Authors and Citation
text: CE BARBOZA. Maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: BARBOZA C (2023). ReportGenerator: Automatic report generator Darwin EU studies. R package version 1.9.0, https://darwin-eu-dev.github.io/ReportGenerator/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ReportGenerator: Automatic report generator of the Darwin EU studies},   author = {CE BARBOZA},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 1.9.0},   url = {https://darwin-eu-dev.github.io/ReportGenerator/}, }

title: Automatic report generator of the Darwin EU studies
text: ReportGenerator R package creates automatic study reports DARWIN EU® research. includes Shiny app user can select specific type study according Complete Catalogue Standard Data Analyses (D1.3.8.2), tables/figures produce set menu outputs.

title: Automatic report generator of the Darwin EU studies
text: can install development version ReportGenerator like : test package, generate first mock data generateMockData(). create “results” folder working directory contains IncidencePrevalence data csv zip format. reportGenerator() takes input zip csv files results IncidencePrevalence. launch Shiny app just type console:

title: ReportGenerator 1.9.0
text: Users can select version IncidencePrevalence data ReportGenerator accepts. Yaml file items configuration. Github website. Improvements function variablesConfigYaml() add new versions results yaml file.

title: ReportGenerator 1.8.2
text: New download button.

title: ReportGenerator 1.8.1
text: Updated last CRAN version IncidencePrevalence.

title: ReportGenerator 1.8.0
text: Preview items can locked added Word report. Fixed bug prevented loading one database. Corrections plot filters.

title: ReportGenerator 1.7.1
text: Fixes filters facets figures.

title: ReportGenerator 1.7.0
text: Fixed bug “unknown file” generating Word report. Added incidence prevalence figures sex age. User can select data table 1 according analysis_id

title: ReportGenerator 1.5.1
text: Automatic text corrections Fixed error loading files temp dir

title: ReportGenerator 1.5.0
text: Plotting now uses functions IncidencePrevalence package. Improved code efficiency using reactiveValues gather data. Fixes mock data generator; now generates mock populations different sizes.

title: ReportGenerator 1.4.0
text: file input now accepts multiple zip folders, .e. data several databases. Drag drop menu back. Bug related type graph prevented generation report solved.

title: ReportGenerator 1.3.0
text: Tables now use package Huxtable. Table 1 now available preview print report. Data cleaned now every time new zip uploaded file input. Fixes reset.

title: ReportGenerator 1.2.0
text: Figures incidence now drop menu select facet, either database outcome.

title: ReportGenerator 1.1.0
text: Check new logo! Figure 1 now drop menu tu select either Option Option B (Facet Outcome, Facet Database).

title: ReportGenerator 1.0.1
text: Improvements generateMockData()

title: ReportGenerator 1.0.0
text: Working version use Darwin sprint. Main functionality package can accessed reportGenerator(), launches Shiny app. Tables Figures show results incidence IncidencePrevalence package.
